inboundReferences.contextLine: - > ...treated as components in an additively decomposed utility function. In a finite horizon problem with $n$ decisions, the [[utility]] associated with a sequence of rewards $r_{1:n}$ is given by $\sum_{t=1}^{n} r_t$
- A *utility* node represents a [[utility]] variable, noted by diamonds and cannot have children
The definition of an optimal policy $\pi*$ is one that maximizes the [[utility]]:
